author: Karl Rock
description:
I caught a street scammer in New Zealand and filmed exactly how this scam works. Watch how he approaches people, what he gives you, and how he pressures you into paying. Stay alert and don’t fall for this fake monk scam happening around Auckland!

This scam works by giving you a “free” bracelet to seem friendly. Once you take it, they show a donation sheet and expect around $20. It’s not a real charity! Even without pressure, the whole setup is designed to make you feel obligated. Only donate to registered charities. Stay aware!

#scam #scams #scammer
title: I Caught a Street Scammer! Beware!

author: Karl Rock
description: Would you shake a strangers hand after they went digging for gold?
title: What would you do?
